input.sentences: the board meets and discusses today 's agenda .
the leader prepares to give a speech .
the leader gives a speech about today 's agenda .
their is a followup with another speaker .
the leader takes questions from the students .
output.sentences: The company meets and discusses the agenda on the board.
Our founder gave a speech on what prepares a leader for greatness.
His speech highlighted that a leader should make his team aware of the overarching agenda.
The next speaker was our team leader who gave a presentation on followup and post-action-review.
Finally our founder takes students' questions.
